name: microcosm (itch) (Red Panda Studios)
description:
microcosm is a Lovecraft-inspired pet simulation game. Feed, nurture, and make sacrifices to your own being of horror (and also cuteness)!

Made in 24 Hours in support of St. Jude Children's Hospital. Everything you see here was made during one consecutive 24 hour long live stream.

Updates coming soon!

PS: There are multiple endings and other creatures you can unlock depending on how you raise your pet. Keep an eye on the meters and try providing resources in different ways! One run takes about 10 minutes.
